structure.unit: B KENTUCKY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION INFRASTRUCTURE AUTHORITY

law.catch_line: Conflict of interest for officers or employees of an authority.
law.text: Officers or employees of an authority shall not have any direct interest in the sale or purchase of any project revenue bonds authorized by that authority. Violation of this section shall be punishable by fine of not more than one thousand dollars ($1,000) or by imprisonment for not more than one (1) year, or both.
law.history: Created 2009 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 95, effective June 26, 2009.
